name: Vibrato Pedal
description: This is an example that shows how to use the fx_variable_delay effect to create a vibrato effect.  A vibrato effect changes the pitch of the incoming signal based on the value of an LFO (low-frequency oscillator).
right-pot-function: The type of LFO waveform used to change the pitch. Full left is sine, center is triangle and right is random
right-switch-function: Tap it a few times to set the vibrato tempo
creator: DreamMaker
